headline: Keurig Dr Pepper named a top overall pick at Citi
summary: Investing.com -- Citi analysts named Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ:KDP) as its top overall pick in the beverage sector in a note Thursday, citing strong momentum in its refreshment beverage business and manageable risks in its coffee segment.
